factionKeyword: adeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartes
lore: Bladeguard Ancients bear the honour of carrying their Chapter’s precious standards into battle. The most revered of these incorporate the remains of fallen heroes of the Chapter; in their presence, battle-brothers are inspired to emulate the legendary deeds of these paragons of old.

otherAbilities.name: Astartes Banner:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

otherAbilities.name: Deeds of Heroism:
otherAbilities.description: Once per battle, when this model is selected to fight, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in this model’s unit.
